document.full_text: iran's response to a letter from the european union aimed at reviving talks on tehran's nuclear program contains nothing new and does not appear to justify another meeting, the bloc said on wednesday.
document.title: iran letter does not justify new nuclear meeting: eu
lines_and_colors: iran's response to a letter from the european union aimed at reviving talks on tehran's nuclear program contains nothing new and does not appear to justify another meeting, the bloc said on wednesday.
